item.title: Zone 1 :: Gear 1 :: I'm a Starbucks Tall :: #1
item.description: Kirb your enthusiasm Hint:   Don’t overthink it, He’s in a better place.   Hint:   Inhale, exorcise   Answer:   Ghost Kirby
item.content:
Kirb your enthusiasm

Hint:   Don’t overthink it, He’s in a better place.  

Hint:   Inhale, exorcise  

Answer:   Ghost Kirby

item.title: Zone 1 :: Gear 1 :: I'm a Starbucks Tall :: #2
item.description: Perhaps some espresso could cure this. Hint:   Sometimes all we need is a little Pal in our lives.   Answer:   Depresso
item.content:
Perhaps some espresso could cure this.

Hint:   Sometimes all we need is a little Pal in our lives.  

Answer:   Depresso

item.title: Zone 1 :: Gear 1 :: I'm a Starbucks Tall :: #3
item.description: His mission is this: recover his ship’s parts. Recruit any help he can find. You have 30 days. Answer:   Olimar
item.content:
His mission is this: recover his ship’s parts. Recruit any help he can find. You have 30 days.

Answer:   Olimar

item.title: Zone 1 :: Gear 1 :: I'm a Starbucks Tall :: #4
item.description: Small but on the ball. When you thought we were long done, we changed it all. Ask about our Wrenches, Business, and Spiders. Hint:   _____ Man, _____ Nintendo, _____ Bowl   Hint:   🍌   Answer:   Super Monkey Ball Banana Rumble
item.content:
Small but on the ball. When you thought we were long done, we changed it all. Ask about our Wrenches, Business, and Spiders.

Hint:   _____ Man, _____ Nintendo, _____ Bowl  

Hint:   🍌  

Answer:   Super Monkey Ball Banana Rumble

item.title: Zone 1 :: Gear 1 :: I'm a Starbucks Tall :: #5
item.description: He doesn’t want your wroughtten garbage. Hint:   His type is usually into garbage, but he has a finer palate.   Answer:   Remy
item.content:
He doesn’t want your wroughtten garbage.

Hint:   His type is usually into garbage, but he has a finer palate.  

Answer:   Remy
